version_description: Introducing Step. Sign up to reserve your place in line for an account through the app. Start earning rewards today by inviting friends, you both earn $1 when they sign up.

• iOS 13 Support
• Various bug fixes and stability improvements
Select early adopters can now order their Step Card.
Select early adopters can now order their Step Card
Select early adopters can now order their Step Card

Improved transaction details such as merchant logo and name.
Many small on-boarding improvements such as shipping address auto-complete and guided on-boarding.
Support for location sharing to help Step protect users from fraud.

Invitations links now point to a personalized Web landing page
New intro screens in app

Invitations links now point to a personalized Web landing page

Bug fixes and improved stability in the app.
Improvements to the sign up flow and general bug fixes.
Improvements to the sign up flow and general bug fixes.
Improvements to the sign up flow and general bug fixes.
Laying the groundwork for a few exciting features. Stay tuned!
Referrals are now back!

* Dark mode
* Teens can link their own bank account (debit card) to add money to their Step Card
Bug fixes and stability improvements
Allowances are now available with Recurring Payments

- Bank account and routing number: set up direct deposit or connect to Venmo, Cash App, or Paypal
- Allowances are now available with Recurring Payments

We've been hard at work fixing bugs and adding new features for you! Download the latest Step app to get access to these awesome features:
∙ Bank account and routing number: set up direct deposit or connect to Venmo, Cash App, or Paypal.
∙ Allowances are now available with Recurring Payments.
∙ Set or change your username.
∙ Fewer crashes on iOS 14, guaranteed!

∙ Bank account and routing number: set up direct deposit or connect to Venmo, Cash App, or Paypal.
∙ Allowances are now available with Recurring Payments.
∙ Set or change your username.
∙ Fewer crashes on iOS 14, guaranteed!

We've been hard at work fixing bugs and adding new features for you! Download the latest Step app to get access to these awesome features:

∙ Bank account and routing number: set up direct deposit or connect to Venmo, Cash App, or Paypal.
∙ Allowances are now available with Recurring Payments.
∙ Set or change your username.
∙ Fewer crashes on iOS 14, guaranteed!

Another week, another round of features and fixes:

∙ ATM access for cash withdrawal is now being rolled out to users who have requested it.
∙ Bank account and routing number: set up direct deposit or connect to Venmo, Cash App, or Paypal.
∙ Some big under-the-hood performance and stability improvements to the app.
∙ Fixed a bug when updating name on card.

Here's some of the exciting new stuff in our app:

∙ ATM access for cash withdrawal is now being rolled out to users who have requested it.
∙ Bank account and routing number: set up direct deposit or connect to Venmo, Cash App, or Paypal.
∙ Fixed a bug that could cause the app to crash when disabling passcode.

Back at it again:

∙ $3 referrals is back for a limited time!
∙ ATM access is being rolled out to more customers every week. Signup for early access in the app.
∙ Bank account and routing number: set up direct deposit or connect to Venmo, Cash App, or Paypal.
∙ Improvements to device security. Keeping your data safe is our highest priority!
∙ And of course, lots of bug fixes as always!

Back at it again:
∙ $3 referrals is back for a limited time!
∙ ATM access is being rolled out to more customers every week. Signup for early access in the app.
∙ Bank account and routing number: set up direct deposit or connect to Venmo, Cash App, or Paypal.
∙ Improvements to device security. Keeping your data safe is our highest priority!
∙ And of course, lots of bug fixes as always!

Back at it again:
∙ $3 referrals is back for a limited time!
∙ ATM access is being rolled out to more customers every week. Signup for early access in the app.
∙ Bank account and routing number: set up direct deposit or connect to Venmo, Cash App, or Paypal.
∙ Improvements to device security. Keeping your data safe is our highest priority!
∙ And of course, lots of bug fixes as always!

Step's spreading some holiday cheer with these new updates:
∙ Having problems getting back into your account? You can use your e-mail now to get back in.
∙ Not a teenager yet? That’s OK, we’ve now opened Step to anyone regardless of age!
∙ Referrals are now available to everyone, teens and parents.
∙ ATM access is being rolled out to more customers every week. Signup for early access in the app.
∙ Bank account and routing number: set up direct deposit or connect to Venmo, Cash App, or Paypal.
∙ Step's little elves have been busy squashing bugs, too!

Another round of awesome updates:
∙ We now validate your shipping address, to make sure you receive your Step Card.
∙ We've added a new Help Center, with lots of helpful articles to resolve common issues quickly.
∙ Signup with your Apple or Google login (or a verified e-mail) to make sure you never get locked out.
∙ We've enabled ATM access for more customers, you can signup for early access in the app.
∙ Not a teenager yet? That’s OK, we’ve now opened Step to anyone regardless of age!
∙ Referrals are now available to everyone, teens and parents.

∙ We now validate your shipping address, to make sure you receive your Step Card.
∙ We've added a new Help Center, with lots of helpful articles to resolve common issues quickly.

Let's get it! Here is what's new in the Step app:
∙ Improved shipping address validation, so your Step Card gets sent to the right place.
∙ Brand new Help Center, with lots of helpful articles to resolve common issues quickly.
∙ Signup with your Apple or Google login (or verify any e-mail) to make sure you never get locked out in the future.
∙ ATM access is enabled for more customers, you can request early access inside the app.
∙ Enabled linking an external bank account for more customers, you can request early access inside the app.
∙ Not a teenager yet? That's OK, we've opened Step to anyone regardless of age!
∙ Referrals are now available to everyone, teens and parents.

Spreading the love with some sweet new updates!
∙ Referrals are now available to everyone, teens and parents.
∙ ATM cash withdrawals are now available to all customers.
∙ You can link your external bank account and fund your Step account or withdraw money.
∙ And of course, plenty of bug fixes and performance improvements.

Fresh out of the oven with a hot new release:
∙ Quick access right from the home screen to common actions, such as adding or withdrawing money, managing your Step Card, or to setup recurring payments.
∙ Getting back into your account is easier than ever, when you link a verified email, or sign in with Apple or Google.
∙ You can now setup a passcode for your Step app, so securing your account is easier than ever!
∙ More options for choosing where to ship your Step Card.

Rounding out financial literary month with some sweet new updates:
∙ Quick access right from the home screen to common actions, such as adding or withdrawing money, managing your Step Card, or to setup recurring payments.
∙ Getting back into your account is easier than ever, when you link a verified email, or sign in with Apple or Google.
∙ You can now setup a passcode for your Step app, so securing your account is easier than ever!
∙ More options for choosing where to ship your Step Card.
